original_title: Si Tokhang at ang Tropang Buang
overview: The story revolves around a hermit named Tokhang. People ridicule her because of her eerie look and scary demeanor. As a bearer of bad tidings,  she manages to expose and criticize the foolishness and corruption of the people around her and the society in which they lived in.
title: Si Tokhang at ang Tropang Buang
